mapper.update: update xjhb_check set materal = #{materal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infomation_id = #{infomationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, materal, status, project_id, infomation_id, create_time from xjhb_check
